ftbquests.chapter.bosses_and_skill_point: &9&l Bosses and Skill Points[--&9&lBoss和技能点--]
&2Overworld&f: Extinction was a lie[--&2主世界&f:灭火是个谎言--]
You can craft an eye of desert to locate the structure[--你可以制作沙漠之眼来定位结构--]

In Minecraft's depths, the Remnant, last of the ancient dinosaurs, slumbers. Awakened by players, this colossal creature challenges them in a monumental battle, symbolizing a lost era. [--在Minecraft的深处,遗迹,最后的古代恐龙,沉睡之地。被玩家觉醒,这个巨型生物在巨大的战斗中挑战他们,象征着一个失落的时代。--]
Its defeat marks the end of a prehistoric legacy.[--它的失败标志了史前遗迹的末地。--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
&2Overworld&f: From the Abyss[--&2主世界&f:来自深渊--]
You can craft an eye of abyss to locate the structure[--你可以制作一个深渊之眼来定位结构--]
Found in the &2Suken City&r, use an &dAbyssal Sacrifice&r on the Abyssal Altar to summon the creature.[--在&2沉积之城&r中找到,在深渊祭坛上使用&d深渊献祭&r召唤生物.--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
&eEnd&f: Protector of the end[--&e末地&f:末地保护者--]
You can craft an eye of the void to locate the structure.[--你可以制作虚空之眼来定位结构。--]

In the End's desolate expanse, stands the Ender Guardian Golem, a formidable sentinel crafted by the Endermen to protect their realm. Imbued with mysterious powers, it fiercely defends the End's secrets against any intruder.[--在末影荒芜之地,有末影守护者傀儡,这是末影人制作的强大的哨兵,可以保护他们的世界。它拥有神秘的力量,它强力保护末影人的秘密,防止任何入侵。--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
&cNether&f: The immortal [--&c下界&f:不朽之地--]
You can craft a flame eye to locate the structure[--你可以制作火焰之眼来定位结构--]
Found at the last floor of the &2Burning Arena&r. Use &8burning ashes&r dropped from Ignited Revenant into the Altar of Fire[--在&2燃烧之战&r的最后一个地板上找到。使用从点燃的燃煤&8掉入火之祭坛的&8燃烧之骨&r--]
Not being able to be deafened by a single human[--不能被一个人类震耳欲聋--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
&cNether&f: The Monstrosity of lava[--&c下界&f:熔岩之魔--]
You can craft an eye of netherite monstrosity to locate the structure[--你可以制作下界合金巨兽之眼来定位结构--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
&2Overworld&f: Who needs to build one?[--&2主世界&f:谁需要建造一个?--]
You can craft an eye of mech to locate the structure[--你可以制作一个Mech之眼来定位结构--]
Found in the &2Ancient Factory&r deep in the overworld.[--在主世界深处的&2古工厂&r中找到.--]
Use a nether star to wake him up.[--用下界之星唤醒他。--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
&eEnd&f: Void Worm[--&e末影&f:虚空蠕虫--]
This boss can be baited out of the void by tossing a Msyerious Worm into the End's void.[--这个Boss可以通过将麻痹虫扔进末地虚空来被诱饵从虚空中扔出.--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
&cNether&f: Warped Mosco[--&c下界&f:诡异苔藓--]
When a Crimson Mosquito sucks blood of strange fungal create, especially one covered in Warped Fungus, it will begin to mutate into this beast.[--当一头绯红蚊子吸取奇异菌类的血液时,特别是一只被诡异菌覆盖的菌,它将开始变异为这只野兽。--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
&eEnd&f: The Obsidilith[--&e末影&f:黑石--]
Upon discovering the enigmatic boss structure, place an Eye of Ender on the altar to awaken the formidable presence within.[--发现神秘Boss结构后,在祭坛上放一个末影之眼来唤醒其中的强大存在。--]
This living monolith, a master of the void's mysterious forces, resides in the Obsidilith Arena.[--这块活石英,虚空神秘力量的主人,位于黑石战场中。--]
This colossal, floating edifice hovers ominously in the endless void, waiting for challengers to test their mettle against its ancient power.[--这个巨大的浮空建筑在无限虚空中不祥地悬停,等待挑战者对古老的力量测试他们的战利品。--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
&2Overworld&f: The Void Blossom[--&2主世界&f:虚空花--]
You can use a void lily to track the boss structure.[--你可以使用空的百合来追踪Boss结构.--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
&2Overworld&f: The Night Lich[--&2主世界&f:夜行巫妖--]
The Night Lich, a sinister entity, reigns over colder biomes of the Overworld from its eerie Lich Tower. [--巫妖是一个险恶的实体,它从精灵巫妖塔控制着主世界的寒冷生物群系。--]
Veiled in darkness, it wields ancient, shadowy magic, casting long nights and terror upon those who dare approach its frost-enshrouded domain.[--它笼罩在黑暗中,使用古老的、阴暗的魔法,给那些胆敢靠近其冰霜富集之域的人施放长夜和恐惧。--]
Fight him preferably with flying powers.[--最好用飞行能力与他战斗。--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
&cNether&f: The Nether Gauntlet[--&c下界&f:下界护手--]
The Gauntlet is located in rare structures at the Nether.[--护手位于下界的稀有结构中。--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
&2Overworld&f: Wither[--&2主世界&f:凋零--]
The &0Wither&r is really tough to beat because it can fly, move quickly, and explodes a lot. You know what I mean.[--&0凋灵&r非常难击败,因为它可以飞行,移动得快,并爆炸得非常多.你了解我意思.--]

To call it forth, set up 4 Soul Sand blocks in a \"T\" shape. Then, put the &e3 Wither Skeleton Skulls&r on top of the \"T\" to make the &0Wither&r appear.[--要召唤它,请在“T”形状下设置4个灵魂沙块。然后将&e3凋灵骷髅头颅&r放在“T”上,让&0凋灵&r出现。--]
Be careful, it explodes a lot! So, it's best not to summon it close to your base.[--注意,它会爆炸很多!所以,最好不要召唤它靠近你的基地。--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
&2Overworld&f: Warden[--&2主世界&f:监守者--]
The &2Warden&r is blind! It can only find you if it hears you, so either fly around or sneak![--&2卫道士&r失明!它只有在它听到你的时候才能发现你,所以或是四处飞行,或是潜行!--]

It doesn't matter if you use ranged or melee attacks, because it will found you, If you go too far, it'll burrow into the ground and come up next to you![--使用远程攻击或近战攻击并不重要,因为它会发现你,如果你走得太远,它会埋在地上并靠近你!--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
&2Overworld&f: Cyclops Slayer[--&2主世界&f:独眼巨人杀手--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
&2Overworld&f: Hydra Slayer[--&2主世界&f:九头蛇杀手--]

Hydras can be found in dirt caves protruding from swamps. They're formiddible foes that use venom, and the only way to kill them without letting them heal is using fire.[--九头蛇可以在来自沼泽的泥土洞穴中找到。它们是使用毒液的可驯服的敌人,在不让它们治疗的情况下杀死它们的唯一方法是使用火。--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
&2Overworld&f: Sea Serpent Slayer[--&2主世界&f:海蛇杀手--]
Sea Serpents are formidable foes that can be found in oceans throughout the world. They have a deadly bite and a powerful water blast attack.[--海蛇是巨大的敌人,可以在世界上的海洋中找到。它们有致命的咬咬和强大的水爆炸攻击。--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
&2Overworld&f: Lord Pumpkinhead[--&2主世界&f:南瓜头领--]
Use Transmuting Elixer on an infernal Evil Pumpkin.[--在地狱邪恶南瓜上使用转化精灵。--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
&2Overworld&f: Lightning Dragon Slayer[--&2主世界&f:闪电龙杀手--]

Lightning dragons can be found in the overworld or undergound in certain warm biomes: badlands, savanna. These beasts are not to be taken lightly, and you'll want to gear up tremendously before attempting to fight one.[--闪电龙可以在主世界中找到,也可以在一些温暖的生物群系中被解锁:恶地,热带草原。这些野兽不会被轻快地抓走,在试图与它们战斗之前,你会非常想要装备起来。--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
&2Overworld&f: Ice Dragon Slayer[--&2主世界&f:冰龙杀手--]

Ice dragons can be found in the overworld or undergound in cold biomes. These beasts are not to be taken lightly, and you'll want to gear up tremendously before attempting to fight one.[--冰龙可以在主世界找到,也可以在寒冷的生物群系中喂食。这些野兽不会被轻快地抓走,在尝试战斗之前,你会非常想要装备起来。--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
&2Overworld&f: Fire Dragon Slayer[--&2主世界&f:火龙杀手--]

Fire dragons can be found in the overworld or undergound in warm biomes. These beasts are not to be taken lightly, and you'll want to gear up tremendously before attempting to fight one.[--火龙可以在主世界中找到,也可以在温暖的生物群系中被烤熟。这些野兽不会被轻快地抓走,在尝试战斗之前,你会非常想要装备起来。--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
&2Overworld&f: Myrmex Queen[--&2主世界&f: Myrmex Queen--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
&2Overworld&f: Corrupted Champion[--&2主世界&f:腐化冠军--]

The Corrupted Champion is the entombed remnant of an unknown hero, fallen into corruption. Its power arise from its bone staff, which was crafted from the bones of its innocent victims. With its power, the lich can controll the minds of its enemies and turn peaceful beings into abominations fighting along its side. But beware. Even if you manage to drain the staff's corruption, the fight isn't over.[--腐化之王是一个未知英雄的下界遗迹,他进入了腐化。它的力量来源于骨杖,骨杖是其邪恶牺牲者之骨制成的。用它的力量,巫妖可以控制其敌人的心智,并将和平生物变成令人憎恶的战斗。但要注意。即使你试图耗尽法杖的腐化,战斗也并没有结束。--]
&c-> How to summon the Corrupted Champion:&r[--&c->如何召唤腐化冠军:&r--]

-Collect the three bone staff pieces (Ominous Bone Staff Fragment) from the Ruins structure. Every Ruin has a unique fragment (upper, middle and lower bone staff fragment).[---从遗迹结构中收集3个骨杖碎片(金色骨杖碎片)。每个遗迹都有独特的碎片(上、中、下骨杖碎片)。--]
-Obtain a bone dagger from an Acolyte, or craft it yourself.[---从方解石中找到一把骨匕首,或者自己制作.--]
-Hold a glass bottle in your offhand and start killing villager with the bone dagger. You'll get a Vial of Blood. Fill the vial to the limit.[---在副手拿着一个玻璃瓶,开始用骨匕首杀死村民。你会得到一个血之瓶。把瓶子填满到极限。--]
-Find the Lich Prison structure, a large floating island above the oceans.[---找到巫妖监狱结构,一个在海洋上漂浮的大岛屿。--]

-Wait until it is night, place the bone staff pieces (from upper to lower) on the dark corrupted deepslate blocks in front of the altar (they should fairly stand out).[--- 等待到夜晚,将骨杖碎片(从上到下)放在祭坛前面的黑暗腐化深板岩块上(它们应该站出来)。--]
-Pour the Vial of Blood into the altar.[---把血之瓶扔进祭坛。--]
&bVoilà, you unleashed pure evil into the world, probably causing the death of thousands of innocent people and very likely your own.&r[--&b放入,你将纯粹的邪恶放入了世界,可能会使上千个无辜的人死亡,并且非常可能使你自己的人死亡.&r--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
&2Overworld&f: Sir Pumpkinhead[--&2主世界&f:南瓜猪头--]
You can summon him by destroying a special pumpkin surrounded by candles that you can meet in the world.[--你可以通过摧毁一个被蜡烛包围的特殊南瓜来召唤他,你可以在世界上遇到蜡烛。--]
The boss has 3 phases.[--Boss有3个阶段.--]
You have to kill in last phase for quest to work.[--你必须在最后阶段杀死才能工作。--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]

&2Overworld&f: Pumpkillager[--&2主世界&f:泵匠--]

The first encounter with the Pumpkillager. He'll appear randomly after breaking a pumpkin that doesn't have any blocks surrounding it. You'll be given a quest book.[--与南瓜屠宰机的第一次接触。在破坏一个周围没有方块的南瓜后,他会随机出现。你会得到一本任务书。--]
Follow the quest book in order to process the next steps.[--跟随任务书来处理下一个步骤。--]
+1 Skill Point[--+1技能点--]
Complete all the quests in this chapter.[--完成此章节中的所有任务。--]
Completionist[--完成者--]
&2Overworld&f: Elder Guardian[--&2主世界&f:远古守卫--]
